QuestData.Title: The Dread Clutches
QuestData.Description: The imperial clutches have become an abomination! Clutch-Keepers rush the development of new swarmborn, saturating them in this vile "sha" energy before sending them away to the wall.$B$BThe Klaxxi wish to stem the tide of swarmborn production in these dread clutches. Put the keepers to death!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 6 Shek'zeer Clutch-Keepers in the Clutches of Shek'zeer.
QuestData.CompletionText: They have forsaken our ways and they will pay dearly for it.
QuestData.RewardText: A few less traitors for us to feed to the kunchong when the dust settles.
